DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to explore the prevalence of ALK/ROS1/MET mutations assessed with ctDNA samples in EGFR-wildtype NSCLC
DOC.brief_title: ALK/ROS1/MET Mutations on Plasma ctDNA in Patients With NSCLC
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirmed stage IIIB/IV NSCLC; Histologically confirmed adenocarcinoma; EGFRwildtype NSCLC; Provision of blood (plasma) sample for ctDNA testing; Patient must be able to comply with the protocol; Provision of blood (plasma) sample for ctDNA testing; As judged by the investigator, any evidence of severe or uncontrolled systemic disease (e.g. unstable or uncompensated respiratory, cardiac, hepatic or renal disease); Histologically confirmed small cell lung cancer or other metastatic tumors; Patient with no histologic or cytological diagnosis;
